statements.statement: SELECT DISTINCT MS_STATION VALUE, MS_STATION || ' ' || REPLACE(MS_ST_NAME,CHR(13)||CHR(10),'') TEXT FROM MS_ZISEKI LEFT JOIN MS_STATION USING (MS_STATION) WHERE TO_CHAR(MS_JITU_YMD,'YYYYMMDD') > '19700101' ORDER BY MS_STATION

SELECT DISTINCT 指示月度 VALUE, SUBSTR(指示月度,1,4) || '年' || SUBSTR(指示月度,5,6) || '月' TEXT FROM TBL_作業指示保存 UNION SELECT DISTINCT MS_JUN_YYMM VALUE, SUBSTR(MS_JUN_YYMM,1,4) || '年' || SUBSTR(MS_JUN_YYMM,5,6) || '月' TEXT FROM MS_SAGYO_KEEP ORDER BY VALUE DESC
